tasks.task_description: Run pnpm install to pull new UI and Playwright dependencies
Start the stack with pnpm dev:services

description: Update environment with new features including Playwright tests, analytics pipeline, claim timelines, and scope-aware UI
context: Successfully installed new dependencies including Playwright.
